metadata.titel_preek: A President Of Preaching (Funeral Sermon for Sandy Ray)

locutie.beschrijving: A eulogy and homily celebrating the life of Rev. Sandy Ray, transitioning into an exposition of Jesus' high priestly prayer regarding the believer's transition to glory.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: The exegesis of John 17:24 is imaginative and dramatic, focusing on the 'will' of Jesus as a royal prerogative.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting the virtues of the deceased and the nature of Christ's desire, with a late shift into promising the hope of reunion.
voorbeelden: We stand too close to the shock...
Father, I will that they also... be with me.

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Consolation of the bereaved, inspiration through the legacy of the deceased, and assurance of the heavenly reality.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Implicit; the sermon relies on the 'golden voice' and the 'magic hand' of the preacher rather than explicit invocation of the Spirit's current work.

voorbeelden: He was a crown prince of the pulpit.
As for me, I always felt better...
How touching that he would be called.
We'll meet and tell the story.
I go to prepare a place for you.
commissieven.kwaliteit: The promises are largely quoted from Jesus or placed in the future; the preacher rarely 'binds' himself to a promise in the 'now'.

voorbeelden: He passed through Jordan standing up!
declaratieven.autoriteit: High rhetorical authority, but functions more as a poetic 'naming' of reality than a sacramental 'absolution'.

indicatoren: Third-person narrative of the deceased's career
Description of past events in Texas
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes a spectator of a great life rather than a participant in a current divine act.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the Gospel promise to the grieving 'you' in the present tense
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Inspiration by proxy; the hearer feels the greatness of Sandy Ray but may not feel the immediate 'happening' of God's word to them.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: The toezegging is mediated through the character of Jesus in the text rather than the preacher's direct 'I promise you'.
voorbeelden: I want him to see what I have prepared for him.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal testimony and relationship with the deceased.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Addressing the family and the church congregation directly.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to acknowledge their heritage and grief.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Sandy Ray, God, and Jesus.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a hagiographic distance; the sermon is 'about' a hero.

tijdloos_present.gebruik: General truths about God's provision and the nature of preaching.

actueel_present.gebruik: The immediate moment of the funeral and the 'crossing over'.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: Not legalistic; does not move from Assertive to Directive in a moralistic way.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Assertive (Life of Ray) -> Assertive (Words of Jesus) -> Commissive (Future hope).
voorbeelden: He was a preacher... Jesus said 'I will'... We'll meet on some glad tomorrow.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The pattern is poetic but lacks a strong 'Declarative' bridge that changes the hearer's status now.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: You are left a noble heritage (Indicative), [implied: live accordingly].

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a powerful testimony to a life and a past ministry, using the 'event' of the funeral to point toward a future 'event' of resurrection.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The heavens seemed to open and we could see the Lord God on his throne.
sterke_punten.effect: Creates a powerful mental image that approaches an 'event'.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: He once branded onto the consciousness... His unvarying support...
zwakke_punten.probleem: Too much time spent on 'talking about' the past.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is an 'event' of memory and honor, but the 'event' of the Word addressing the sinner/mourner is secondary to the eulogy.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The sermon describes a means of grace (Sandy Ray's preaching) rather than being the primary means of grace itself in the moment.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: God is seen as the 'Writer' of Ray's life, but the preacher speaks more as a witness than a mandatory.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: The preacher acts as a 'friend' and 'colleague' more than a 'herald' of the immediate Word.
tekstueel_bewijs: I have groped through grief for some word to speak to myself as well as to you.

pneumatologie.geest_rol_erkend: No explicit mention of the Holy Spirit.
pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: The effect is left to the 'magic' of the rhetoric and the 'film of grief'.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon treats the *deceased's* preaching as a means of grace.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Highly epiphanic in its description of the 'crossing over'.
tekstueel_bewijs: He passed through Jordan standing up!

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is heavy on past-tense 'to be' verbs and descriptive action verbs. It needs more present-tense performative verbs.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: He sent thousands forth from here... with a hope in their hearts.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: The same Jesus who gave him that message now gives you that same hope.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a report of past success to a present-tense gift.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is located in the quote of Jesus rather than the mouth of the preacher.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Use the 'I' of the preacher to deliver the 'I' of Christ.
voorbeeldzinnen: On behalf of the King he served, I declare to you: the rooms are ready for you too.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Increase 'You' (the congregation) in relation to the 'I' of Christ.
voorbeeldzinnen: You do not mourn as those without hope, for Christ wills you to be where He is.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The balance is acceptable for a funeral context.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A rhetorically magnificent eulogy that occasionally touches the performative, but remains largely a constative celebration of a past 'event' of preaching.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SvT would focus on the 'self-revelation' of the preacher's grief; SAT reveals that the preacher is attempting to 'perform' a home-going through words.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: Rhetoric focuses on the beauty of the 'golden voice' description; SAT asks if those words actually 'crossed' the hearer over into peace.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT identifies that the power of this sermon lies in the 'Declarative' act of narrating the death as a 'triumph' (standing up), which attempts to change the reality of the funeral from defeat to victory.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: He passed through Jordan standing up!
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: High; it redefines the nature of the death for the audience.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'locutionary' beauty of the African American preaching tradition to carry its 'illocutionary' weight.
